modName: Scarlett Johansson Companion With Black Widow Bonus Companion-CBBE And UNP
summary: Adds Scarlett and Black Widow as companions to your game.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]Thanks to all that have supported and or Endorsed us![/size][/color]
[img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2ztBV.jpg[/img]

[img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2zjHW.jpg[/img]

[color=#f4cccc][size=4]Celebrating 11/11/17 6 years of SKYRIM! These followers were created from the ever so talented Mod Author of this mod:[/size][/color] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87693/?]ScarlettJohansson2017 by Kaetanii[/url] [color=#f4cccc][size=4]Be sure to Endorse it.[/size][/color]

[color=#f4cccc][size=4]Originally it was just going to be Scarlett then the MMS decided to add a twist and add the Black Widow version of Scarlett with a small change of hair style and color. When installing both you will get a popup asking to overwrite the facegen.dds file, just choose yes or no as its exactly the same. If you would like to change the body type to your tastes then be sure to check out our easy to follow tutorial here:[/size][/color] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87851/?]TUTORIAL[/url]

[youtube]DmVqwqQSLn0[/youtube]

[color=#f9cb9c][size=4]STATS (For Both):
LOCATION: Lunds Hut (coc lundshut01)
Height: 1.0 Weight: 65
Speed: 165
Class: Spellsword
Armor And Weapons: Vanilla
Heath, Majicka and Stamina: 300
Skill Bonus: Destruction, Archery, Restoration, Block, Sneak, Two-handed and One-handed: 60
Both can be Married

Credits:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87693/?]ScarlettJohansson2017 by Kaetanii[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]Demoniac- High Quality Glossy Female Body Texture 8K 4K 2K by Regenbot03[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies and Stealthic[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot as LogRaam[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows by Hvergelmir[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81073/?]Apachii Divine Elegance Store by Apachii and Urshi[/url]

Facelight

GomoPeroPoses






[/size][/color]

[/center]
author: Majestic Mod Squad And Kaetanii
